entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
